abstract: The Chinese microblogging service Weibo was up 19 percent and shares of the real estate website Leju rose 18.6 percent on Thursday.
snippet: The Chinese microblogging service Weibo was up 19 percent and shares of the real estate website Leju rose 18.6 percent on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese are still coming, and so are the investors.

headline.main: Shares of Twitter-Like Weibo Surge on Opening Day, as China I.P.O.s Mount
headline.print_headline: Shares of Twitter-Like Weibo Surge on Opening Day, as China I.P.O.s Mount

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
